scripts.build: pnpm run clean && tsc && pnpm run copy
scripts.copy: mkdir distribution/generated && cp source/generated/bindings.js distribution/generated/ && cp source/generated/bindings.d.ts distribution/generated/ && cp source/generated/evm.*.node distribution/generated/
scripts.build-napi: mkdir source/generated && napi build --platform --cargo-cwd bindings --js bindings.js --dts bindings.d.ts --release && mv evm.*.node bindings.js bindings.d.ts source/generated
scripts.build-napi:debug: napi build --platform --cargo-cwd bindings --js bindings.js --dts bindings.d.ts && mv evm.*.node bindings.js bindings.d.ts source/generated
